description: Route definitions for financial data sources - used by resolve_url tool

yahoo_quote.description: Yahoo Finance stock quote page - shows current price, daily change, volume, market cap

yahoo_news.description: Yahoo Finance news page for a company - shows latest news articles

yahoo_financials.description: Yahoo Finance financials page - shows income statement, balance sheet, cash flow

yahoo_holders.description: Yahoo Finance holders page - shows major institutional and mutual fund holders

yahoo_analysis.description: Yahoo Finance analysis page - shows analyst recommendations, price targets, EPS estimates

yahoo_history.description: Yahoo Finance historical data page - shows historical prices and dividends

yahoo_options.description: Yahoo Finance options page - shows options chain with calls and puts

yahoo_profile.description: Yahoo Finance company profile - shows company description, sector, industry, executives

yahoo_statistics.description: Yahoo Finance statistics page - shows valuation metrics, financial highlights, trading info

sec_filings_search.description: SEC EDGAR filing search - search for company filings by CIK or ticker

sec_full_text_search.description: SEC EDGAR full-text search - search filing content

bloomberg_quote.description: Bloomberg quote page - shows stock price and basic info

marketwatch_quote.description: MarketWatch stock quote page - shows price, news, analysis

marketwatch_financials.description: MarketWatch financials page - shows income statement, balance sheet

finviz_quote.description: Finviz stock quote page - shows technical chart, fundamentals, news

cnbc_quote.description: CNBC stock quote page - shows price, news, analysis

seeking_alpha.description: Seeking Alpha stock page - shows analysis, news, earnings

tradingview_technicals.description: TradingView technical analysis page - shows indicators, oscillators, moving averages

tradingview_gainers.description: TradingView top gainers page for cryptocurrencies

tradingview_losers.description: TradingView top losers page for cryptocurrencies

tipranks_stock.description: TipRanks stock page - shows analyst ratings, price targets, insider trades

generic_url.description: Fallback for any custom URL - use when no predefined route matches
